item.description: MassBio 2012 Annual Meeting When: March 26-27, 2012 Where: Royal Sonesta Cambridge, MA Register: https://checkout.massbio.org/events/calendar/1342-massbio_annual_meeting/event_detail/329/register REGISTER NOW FOR THE $599 EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! Join MassBio for their 2012 Annual Meeting on March 26-27, 2012. The event features keynote speakers NIH Director Francis Collins and FDA Commissioner Margaret Hamburg and others. There will be panel discussions on biosimilars, pre-competitive research, and global competitiveness. Connect with others and forge new scientific and business relationships. This year will be the 4th Annual Innovative Leadership Award luncheon and will also feature the presentation of the MassBio Leading Edge Award.
item.name: MassBio 2012 Annual Meeting
